page.title: 17CHILD LEISURE-IRONBRIDGE
page.content: {Junior-aged children-leisure survey. } The main hobbies for children are pets and reading. A survey showed that 77% children read and look after pets, mainly dogs. The second most popular hobby was sport.We put nine different sports on the survey.They were swimming,snooker, skating,football,netball,running, cricket,horseriding and tennis.The most popular sports of all were swimming and football. Scouts,Guides,Brownies and Cubs,were the third favourite hobby.Local scouts and guides meet at Trinity Hall Coalbrookdale.Their activites include,football, survival games, treking and camping. They also make up plays,sing songs, play games and go on visits.They all work for special badges.
